ygData.subject: Re: Problems connecting
ygData.msgSnippet: I you get in the game adjust the video settings, then adjust your screen settings to match. I can t believe they start everquest with a tiny little screen. It
ygData.messageBody:
I you get in the game adjust the video settings, then adjust your
screen settings to match. I can't believe they start everquest with
a tiny little screen. It doesn't capture the power as well as a full
screen with full view.



--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@m...>
wrote:
> Cool, thanks Wes, I was able to get it to work, something with the
video
> settings. Maybe this will alieviate my problem now of only being
able to
> play in 800x640. I love re-installs. LOL
>
> Steve
>
> -----Original Message-----
> Message: 2
> Date: Tue, 11 Feb 2003 02:51:36 -0000
> From: "Wes <aihacker@y...>" <aihacker@y...>
> Subject: Re: Problems connecting
>
> Yes I had the exact same error. It was cause by my screen
resolution
> being 32 bits when my game resolution was set to 16 bits.
> You can set the graphics resolution once your in the game, but to
get
> in the game try setting your display to 16 bits, 32 bits etc until
> one works.
>
> Hope that solves your problem.
>
> Wes
